channel.title: Super Mario, Lets just say it took forever!
channel.description:
sup Everyone, I've been modeling for a while now and so i thought let me see if I could make this. and so I did.
[IMG]http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p401/animeowns2/supermariomodel.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p401/animeowns2/supermariomodel2.gif[/img]
Please comment if you want. your choice :)

item.description:

[quote=“Godlord006, post:23, topic:346895”][quote author=Jeremy Siner link=topic=443275.msg3255011#msg3255011 date=1278040502]
sup Everyone, I’ve been modeling for a while now and so i thought let me see if I could make this. and so I did.

[I MG]http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p401/animeowns2/supermariomodel.gif[/img]

[ IMG]http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p401/animeowns2/supermariomodel2.gif[/img]

Please comment if you want. your choice
[/quote]
Smexyy. Rep++[/quote]

  1. You need 15 to rep people

  2. Don’t quote original topic especially with pictures. People know your talking about the original topic.

  3. It really isn’t that smexyy when it is 2d and done poorly.

item.title: Super Mario, Lets just say it took forever!
item.dc:creator: @pivotgamer84 pivotgamer84
item.description:
@pivotgamer84 wrote:

darkanton:

3 words, W-o-ah, and yeah if you were to have lots ppl together with this on their cape the server wud lag likes hell, and an npc like Mario would be soo cool

Are you stupid? It would only do that for a texture.
BTW, all you would have to do is triangulate, and reduce poly on model, or increase on client.

Read full topic

item.title: Super Mario, Lets just say it took forever!
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

dragmagic:

For all of u who say its a over kill on the poly limit he can change the max polys in the client haha

but you shouldn’t. if you had like 40 people all with this on a cape standing in the same place the client would lag super hard and FPS would go down to like 2.

Read full topic

Over kill on poly, trace, not animated for npc, and if this is all you can make after a while of modeling…you mite wanna stop.
[/quote]

Cool story Bro[/quote]
I could of made it worse, so…and yeah its true what I said.

item.title: Super Mario, Lets just say it took forever!
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Hate to break it to ya but this is not worth converting to .DAT. Whats the poly? because when that is triangulated and added to a cape itll surely be over the poly limit… Making it 3D? Yea, not going to work. The mesh structure wont allow for anything more than extruding it and even then its still flat… Sorry bud.

Read full topic
